abstract: Organization for Prohibition of Chemical Weapons announces it has contacted Iraqi government about reports that chemical weapons had been used by Islamic State militants against Kurdish fighters in Iraq.
lead_paragraph: The group responsible for monitoring adherence to the global ban on chemical weapons said that it had contacted Iraq over reports of the possible use of such munitions there.

headline.main: Iraq: Monitoring Group to Investigate Possible Chemical Weapons Use by ISIS
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Iraq: Monitoring Group Will Investigate Possible Chemical Weapons Use by ISIS

snippet: The group responsible for monitoring adherence to the global ban on chemical weapons said that it had contacted Iraq over reports of the possible use of such munitions there.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
